ping.description: A simple ping. The Gateway should contact the satellite to return a pong.

telemetry.description: Commands the spacecraft to beacon Health and Status Telemetry for 3 minutes. After executing this command, you can see the telemetry by navigating to the System Telemetry tab or the Analytics Page.

update_file_list.description: Gets the latest list of downloadable files from the spacecraft.

uplink_file.description: Uplink a file from your computer to the spacecraft.

downlink_file.description: Downlink an image from the Spacecraft.

connect.description: Points antennas and starts broadcasting carrier signal to establish RF lock with the spacecraft.

safemode.description: Commands the spacecraft into safemode for 3 minutes, shutting down telemetry and all non-essential systems.

tune_radio.description: Adjust the frequency of the onboard radio

reset_refractor.description: Reset the refractor angle to zero

power_cycle_camera.description: Try switching the camera off then switching it back on again

stow_camera.description: Stow the onboard camera in its protective housing

obtain_image.description: Capture an image with the onboard image capture system
